title: Kuusen Madoushi Kouhosei no Kyoukan (Sky Wizards Academy)
synopsis: Years ago, humanity almost got wiped out by huge magical armored insects that had become too strong and aggressive to handle. Because of these giant bugs, humans do not live on the earth anymore, but in floating cities instead. However, this does not mean that everything is lost, because the wizards from prestigious floating wizard academies are fighting these monsters.
related_anime: ['Kuusen Madoushi Kouhosei no Kyoukan', 'Kuusen Madoushi Kouhosei no Kyoukan: Lecty no, Ikimonogatari']
